description: This file defines a FastAPI router for managing user subscriptions, including listing, creating checkout sessions, activating, and canceling subscriptions, with interactions with database models, security dependencies, and external payment provider services.

methods.name: list_subscriptions( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Returns a list of subscriptions for the current user, ordered by subscription ID descending.

methods.name: create_checkout( payload: SubscriptionPlanRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Creates and returns a stub checkout session using the payment provider.

methods.name: activate_subscription( payload: SubscriptionPlanRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Activates a subscription for the current user, deactivating any existing active subscription.

methods.name: cancel_subscription( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Cancels the current user's active subscription.

ctags.name: activate_subscription
ctags.signature: ( payload: SubscriptionPlanRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: cancel_subscription
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: create_checkout
ctags.signature: ( payload: SubscriptionPlanRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: list_subscriptions
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
